basic.description: The detailed, analytic study of a selected body of texts within the literature of art, directed towards gaining an understanding of the dominant theories, critical attitudes, or historical perspectives on art during a particular period.
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Studies in the Literature of Art

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    A GPA of 2.6 in 24.0 units in  ARTH and Level 4 and registration in an ARTH Major or Medial Plan.
